title: Elf
entryLore: Created by the god Corellon, elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace. While they lost the ability to shape-shift at will long ago, they retain a deep connection to the Feywild and its primal magic. Elves don't sleep but instead enter a Trance when they need to rest, remaining aware of their surroundings while immersing themselves in memories and meditations.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have [[darkvision|Darkvision]] with a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have [[advantage|Advantage]] on [[saving_throw|saving throws]] you make to avoid or end the [[charmed_condition|Charmed condition]].

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have [[proficiency|proficiency]] in the [[insight|Insight]], [[perception|Perception]], or [[survival|Survival]] skill (choose one).

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]] in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation.

markdown:
### Elven Lineages
All elves belong to a specific magical lineage. Choose one of the following lineages to gain additional traits and spells:

*   [[drow|Drow (Underdark)]]
*   [[high_elf|High Elf (Arcane)]]
*   [[wood_elf|Wood Elf (Wild)]]
*   [[eladrin|Eladrin (Feywild)]]
